task_summary: Pick up the red block from the table, using visual feedback and a top grasp, as observed stepwise in the frames.

task_long_description.overview: This episode tasks a robot arm with locating, approaching, and grasping a red block positioned on a table. The robot uses perception (object recognition), approaches from above, aligns, executes a top grasp of the block, and confirms that the object is held. The control sequence, grounded in the observed 9 frames, ends with the red block securely lifted from the table. Constraints include precise alignment and gentle initial force to avoid disturbing other objects.
preconditions: Red block present and unobstructed on the table
stepwise_plan: Verify visibility of red block, retry scanning up to 3 times if necessary
Detect precise position of the block
Move above block with safe offset
Approach and align with tight tolerance
success_criteria: Red block securely held in gripper
Block lifted from the table without collision
All actions completed in correct order
failure_and_recovery: Block not visible: re-scan up to 3 times
Gripper fails to close: abort and alert
Block dropped: return to initial position and retry
task_long_description.termination: Episode ends when the red block is held and lifted above table height.

frame_3.now_evidence: first stable contact and alignment cue visible
frame_3.predicts_next: push actuation expected; confirms goal direction

task_instruction: pick up the red object from the table

node_specs.description: Check if the red block is visible to sensors
Scan scene for the red block if not visible
Open gripper to allow for block grasp
Determine top grasp for red block
Align to block with tight tolerance
Close gripper to gently grasp block

failure_modes: Red block not detected by sensor
Scan fails to find block after 3 attempts
Gripper does not open or close as commanded
recovery_strategy: Repeat approach and grasp as needed
Abort and alert if gripper malfunction
assumptions: Instruction uses 'red object', frames reveal a red cuboid block as the only suitable red item on the table; mapped as 'red_block'.
Picking context is limited to lifting, as no explicit placement is shown in the frames.
No conflicting or missing ports for force/tolerance; minimal values assumed for gentle grasp.

expected_success_criteria: Red block is securely held by gripper and lifted above table height
